meanings.definition: Actinians: a type of sea anemone
meanings.sent1: The actinians swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study actinians to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The actinians had a party and invited all the fish to join them.
meanings.sent4: The actinians stood tall like colorful underwater flowers.
meanings.sent5: Children love watching actinians dance in the sea.

meanings.definition: Actinians: pertaining to or characteristic of sea anemones
meanings.sent1: The actinians habitat provides shelter for various sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: The actinians behavior changes with the tides.
meanings.sent3: The actinians community organized a beach clean-up event.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as the actinians in the coral reef.
meanings.sent5: The actinians colors were as bright as a rainbow in the water.
